cursesComeFirst:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
cursesComeFirst:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

cursesComeFirst:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
cursesComeFirst:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
cursesComeFirst:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

cursesComeFirst:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
cursesComeFirst:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

cursesComeFirst:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
cursesComeFirst:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !cursesComeFirst:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

cursesComeFirst:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
cursesComeFirst:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !cursesComeFirst:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
